heading: Payment Scheme Act 2023 (section 49(4)) Regulations 2024.
text_raw:
1. 
Payment Scheme Act 2023 (section 49(4)) Regulations 2024. 

In these Regulations, “Act of 2023” means the Mother and Baby

title: or (b), or both, of the definition of “relevant person” in section 2(1) of that Act,
heading: Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No. 20 of 2023).

title: or (b), or both, of the definition of “relevant person” in section 2(1) of that Act,
heading: Column 4 of Part 1 of Schedule 1 to the Act of 2023 is amended -
text_raw:
3. 

Column 4 of Part 1 of Schedule 1 to the Act of 2023 is amended - 

(a) 

at reference number 3, by the substitution of “1958” for “1952”, 

(b) 

at reference number 18, by the substitution of “1960” for “1938”, 

(c) 

at reference number 25, by the substitution of “1960” for “1955”, 
and 

(d) 

at reference number 28, by the substitution of “1962” for “1936”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 20th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[467] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 September, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 September, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [467]
